title: 15 Best Remedies To Lose Weight Naturally In 2 Weeks
author: Shaheen Naser Shaheen Naser
description: Lose weight naturally using these 15 remedies. These can also help stabilize your blood sugar and cholesterol levels, boost your energy, and improve your sleep.
cleaned_text: 15 Best Remedies To Lose Weight Naturally In 2 Weeks Burn fat and speed up your weight loss with these remedies picked for you. Putting on weight is always easier than shedding the extra pounds. At least, that's what the vast majority of people believe. If you are concerned about the additional pounds you've gained, don't worry. Here's a great collection of home remedies that can help you lose weight naturally in as little as two weeks. However, remember, it's not going to be easy. [Mary Sabat](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mary-sabat-4b2524a/), Registered Dietitian Nutritionist, says, "Weight loss is not a magic pill, but when you want to lean out in 7 days, the key is to remove all processed foods, alcohol, grains, and complex carbohydrates and eat lean and green with some healthy fats." While these home remedies may not burn all of the fat away by themselves, they will undoubtedly aid in fat burning and help your weight loss journey become quicker and smoother. Continue reading to learn more about them and how they may assist you. In This Article What Causes Weight Gain? Sometimes, you may unintentionally gain weight without increasing your food intake or decreasing your physical activities. This may either be periodic, rapid, or continuous. Periodic weight gain is characterized by fluctuations in your weight every now and then or periodically. This is often witnessed during a woman's menstrual cycle. Rapid and unintentional weight gain is often a side effect of a few medications, and in most cases, this is harmless. Continuous weight gain is gaining weight over time due to varying actors like advancing age or overeating. Here are some additional factors that are seen contributing to weight gain: During the reproductive age, 27% of women run the risk of being overweight. One [study](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8406571/) in the United States showed that nearly 40 years ago only 1 in 50 people had a BMI of 40 or more, while in 2019 it is about 1 in 10. 41% see a prevalence in obesity which has increased since 1976 when the rate was 17%. Through 2030, these rates are anticipated to keep increasing. Pregnant women frequently experience obesity. At conception, 21% of women have a BMI of 30% or more, while 9% of women have BMIs of 35 or above. - Pregnancy: During pregnancy, women tend to put on extra weight as a result of the growing fetus and placenta, amniotic fluid, increased blood supply, and enlarged uterus. - Hormonal Changes: When a woman enters menopause, there is a decrease in the estrogen hormone. This can result in weight gain around the abdominal region and the hips. - Menstruation: Women experience water retention and bloating around that time of the month. This may also be accompanied by varying levels of estrogen and progesterone, which results in periodic weight gain. - Fluid Retention: Fluid retention is also known as edema. It causes your limbs, hands, feet, face or abdomen to look swollen and results in weight gain. - Medications: Certain medications like corticosteroids, antidepressantsi [X]Medications that can aid with disorders like depression and anxiety disorders by reducing their symptoms. , birth control pills, and antipsychotici [X]Medication used to treat psychotic disorders like schizophrenia that include unreal sights, sounds, smells, tastes, or sensations. drugs are known to cause weight gain. [1](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2929498/#:~:text=There%20is%20growing%20interest%20and,levels%20and%20increased%20ghrelin%20levels.)). This can lead to overeating. Hence, try getting adequate sleep to reduce weight gain. Whatever the reason for your weight gain may be, here are some natural remedies that can help you shed those extra pounds in as early as two weeks! 15 Natural Ways To Lose Weight Naturally At Home Lose Weight Naturally 1. Apple Cider Vinegar You Will Need - 1 tablespoon of [apple cider vinegar](https://www.stylecraze.com/articles/benefits-of-apple-cider-vinegar-for-skin-hair-and-health/) - 1 glass of warm water - Honey (optional) What You Have To Do - Add a tablespoon of apple cider vinegar to a glass of warm water. - Mix well and add some honey to it (optional). - Drink this solution. How Often You Should Do This Drink this mixture twice daily. Why This Works Apple cider vinegar, like white vinegar, is a rich source of acetic acid that exhibits anti-inflammatory and anti-obesityi [X]Drugs that are utilized as a treatment for obesity. They reduce extra body fat, caloric intake, and fat absorption. activities and promotes weight loss ( [2](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5532206/)). 2. Green Tea You Will Need - 1 teaspoon of [green tea](https://www.stylecraze.com/articles/20-benefits-of-green-tea-that-you-should-definitely-know/) - 1 cup of hot water What You Have To Do - Add a teaspoon of green tea to a cup of hot water. - Steep for 5 to 7 minutes and strain. - Consume immediately. How Often You Should Do This Drink green tea twice to thrice daily. Why This Works The regular intake of green tea can aid weight loss as well as weight maintenance ( [3](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/19597519/)). Green tea is a rich source of catechins and caffeine, both of which play a significant role in weight loss. 3. Lemon And Honey You Will Need - ½ lemon - 1 teaspoon of honey - 1 glass of warm water What You Have To Do - Add the juice of half a lemon to a glass of warm water. - Mix well and add one teaspoon of honey to it. - Drink the solution immediately. How Often You Should Do This Drink this 2 times daily. Why This Works The combination of lemon juice and honey is a very popular remedy for weight loss. The [vitamin C](https://www.stylecraze.com/articles/amazing-benefits-of-vitamin-c-for-skin-hair-and-health/) in the lemon helps in fat oxidation, and the honey exhibits lipid-lowering activities ( [4](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4910284/)). 4. Black Pepper You Will Need 1 teaspoon of [black pepper powder](https://www.stylecraze.com/articles/amazing-benefits-of-black-pepper/) What You Have To Do Add a teaspoon of powdered black pepper to your tea, salad, or any dish. How Often You Should Do This Do this daily. Why This Works Black pepper contains a compound called piperine, which gives it its pungent flavor. Piperine possesses fat reducing and lipid-lowering activities that can help you in losing weight ( [5](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3113382/)). 5. Parsley Juice You Will Need - 1 cup of [parsley leaves](https://www.stylecraze.com/articles/amazing-health-benefits-of-parsley/) - ½ cup of water - ½ lemon - Honey (optional) What You Have To Do - Wash the parsley leaves and blend them. - To the blend, add the juice of half a lemon and honey. - Drink the mixture on an empty stomach. How Often You Should Do This Drink this once every morning for about 5 days and then again after a break of 10 days. Why This Works The parsley and lemon juice blend is one of the best remedies for weight loss. Both parsley and lemon juice are rich sources of vitamin C, which aids digestion as well as fat oxidation ( [6](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/24876310/)), ( [7](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1253024/)). 6. Cranberry Juice 1 glass of fresh, unsweetened [cranberry juice](https://www.stylecraze.com/articles/best-benefits-of-cranberry-juice-for-skin-hair-and-health/) What You Have To Do Drink a glass of unsweetened cranberry juice. How Often You Should Do This Drink this juice 2 to 3 times daily, preferably before every meal. Why This Works Cranberry juice has very less calories and is a great substitute for other juices. It is also a rich source of antioxidants that help in expelling the toxins from your body and boost your metabolism. This, in turn, may help boost weight loss. However, more research is warranted in this regard. 7. Aloe Vera Juice You Will Need 1 cup of aloe juice What You Have To Do Consume a cup of unsweetened aloe juice. How Often You Should Do This Drink this juice once a day. Why This Works Aloe vera juice can help reduce body weight with its powerful metabolic activities. It also may further help burn body fat ( [8](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/23735317/)). It also aids digestion and reduces inflammatory responses within your body, which facilitate loss of water weight as well. 8. Curry Leaves You Will Need 7-8 curry leaves What You Have To Do - Wash the curry leaves thoroughly. - Consume them every morning on an empty stomach. How Often You Should Do This You must do this daily for a few days. Why This Works Curry leaves reduce your cholesterol and triglyceride levels, thereby helping you lose weight naturally ( [9](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/16552838)). They also help resolve digestive issues as they contain enzymes that promote digestive health and wellness. 9. Cinnamon You Will Need - ½ teaspoon of cinnamon powder - 1 glass of warm water - ½ lemon - Honey What You Have To Do - Add one to two teaspoons of cinnamon powder to a glass of warm water. - Add the juice of half a lemon to this and mix well. - Add honey to this mixture and consume it. How Often You Should Do This Drink this once daily on an empty stomach. Why This Works Cinnamon has been used for ages to combat obesity and reduce weight. These properties can be credited to its metabolic activities that also help in the treatment of heart disease and diabetes ( [10](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5220230/)). 10. Cayenne Pepper You Will Need - 1 teaspoon of cayenne pepper - 1 glass of water - Honey What You Have To Do - Add a teaspoon of powdered cayenne pepper to a glass of water. - Mix well and add a little honey to this. Consume this solution. - Alternatively, you can add a pinch of cayenne pepper to your favorite dishes. How Often You Should Do This Do this once daily. Why This Works Cayenne pepper contains capsaicin that boosts your metabolism and causes our body temperature to rise, thus aiding weight loss ( [11](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5414451/)). 11. Ginger You Will Need - 1 teaspoon of grated ginger - 1 cup of hot water - Honey What You Have To Do - Add a teaspoon of grated ginger to a cup of hot water. - Steep for 7 minutes and strain. - Add a little honey to the ginger tea and mix well. - Drink it before it turns cold. How Often You Should Do This Drink this thrice daily, preferably before every meal. Why This Works Ginger promotes a feeling of satiety and reduces hunger pangs. It also enhances thermogenesisi [X]The mechanism by which organisms produce heat. It helps all warm-blooded creatures as well as several plant species. , which assists in burning the extra fat and helps you lose weight naturally ( [12](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3408800/)). 12. Garlic You Will Need 1-2 teaspoons of grated garlic What You Have To Do - Add one to two teaspoons of grated garlic to all dishes. - You can also directly chew on garlic cloves if you can withstand the strong flavor. How Often You Should Do This You must do this twice daily. Why This Works Garlic is another herb that can help you lose weight naturally. This is due to its natural anti-obesity properties and its ability to boost your body's thermogenesis mechanism ( [13](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/21918057/)). 13. Coconut Oil You Will Need 1 tablespoon of virgin coconut oil What You Have To Do - Consume a tablespoon of virgin coconut oil. - You can also add coconut oil as a seasoning to flavor your salads and dishes. How Often You Should Do This You must consume coconut oil once daily. Why This Works The medium-chain fatty acids in coconut oil may promote weight loss by enhancing the body's metabolism and increasing satiety ( [14](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/18326600/)). However, more research is needed to understand the effects of excess intake of coconut oil. 14. Oolong Tea You Will Need - 1 teaspoon of oolong tea - 1 cup of hot water - Honey What You Have To Do - Add a teaspoon of oolong tea to a cup of hot water. - Steep for about 7 minutes and strain. Allow it to cool for a while. - Add a little honey to it and consume immediately. How Often You Should Do This Drink oolong tea thrice daily. Why This Works Oolong tea is a Chinese beverage that is known to accelerate your metabolism, improve fat mobilization, and prevent fat cell proliferationi [X]The rapid growth or increase in number through the development of additional tissues and cells. ( [15](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/19271168/)). It not only aids weight loss but also helps you maintain your weight. 15. Yogurt You Will Need 1 bowl of plain yogurt What You Have To Do Consume a bowl of plain yogurt. How Often You Should Do This Have yogurt once a day. Why This Works Being a rich source of probiotics (good bacteria), yogurt improves your digestive system and may help boost metabolism. This, in turn, may facilitate weight loss if your diet throughout the day is maintained well ( [16](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/27332081/)). As amazing as the above remedies are, they are not magical. Weight loss is a gradual process that requires moderation. You need to make a few changes to your diet and lifestyle to assist these remedies and lose weight naturally. Listed below are some whole foods rich in nutrition that you must add to your diet as well as eliminate to help you achieve your weight loss goals. Diet Chart Best Foods For Weight Loss - Lean meat - Fish - Fruits - Vegetables - Skimmed milk - Dry fruits and nuts Foods To Avoid - Carbohydrates like white bread, pasta, etc. - Frozen foods - Sugar - Alcohol - Processed foods and drinks Moreover, you can try plant-based healthy eating for optimal weight loss. Along with these dietary changes, you must also consider following the tips mentioned below for faster results and avoid gaining weight in the future. Prevention Tips - Exercise at least 4 days a week. Engaging in physical activities will help you lose weight naturally and keep a check on your diet. - Do not skip breakfast. - Have small meals at regular intervals. - Consume more complex carbohydrates and less of simple carbohydrates. - Boost hydration by drinking plenty of water. - Include a moderate amount of protein in your diet to maintain and increase your muscle mass. - Follow sustainable habits and a balanced diet to lose overall body fat. - Participate in calorie deficit diets that are low-carb and high-protein. - Set a realistic goal and remember to practice self-care, stress management, and mindfulness for natural weight loss. Frequently Asked Questions Which part of the body loses fat first? Mary Sabat says, "The liver will release fat first and then the body releases fat from all areas of the body. It is a fallacy to think that we can spot reduce our weight loss." Does chewing food slowly help you lose weight? According to Mary Sabat, "Chewing our food slowly helps stimulate digestive enzymes that will help break down food and improve digestion. How this could affect weight loss is controversial. Some might say if you digest your food properly and improve your digestion there may be some improvement in weight loss." How to lose weight naturally without exercise? [Jesse Feder](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jesse-feder-a04114145/), Clinical Dietitian at the Memorial Regional Hospital, says, "Without exercise, the best way to lose weight naturally is to reduce your overall caloric intake. This can be done by reducing portion sizes of your meals, drinking more water during meals, or all the above!" How does your weight affect your health and fitness? Putting on weight not only alters your appearance but also reduces the level of fitness and increases your risk of developing major health problems. Overweight people are more likely to develop heart disorders, strokes, diabetes, cancer, and even depression. Key Takeaways - Hormone imbalance and taking certain medications are common causes of weight gain in women. - Consuming green tea, lemon and honey, and black pepper are popular methods used to lose weight. - Exercise regularly, do not skip breakfast, practice portion control, and have small meals for better results. - Include protein and complex carbohydrates in your diet, and avoid simple carbohydrates, sugar, and processed food. - Keeping yourself hydrated may help with weight loss.
